Modern Application: Contained execution & Great Fundamentals. Designed from the ground up to respect user’s privacy, manage battery life, and focus to keep the device safe.
Desktop Application: User & Admin level of security. You have native access to the registry and hard drive folders.

Modern Application: Installation and updates are managed by the platform.
Desktop Application: MSI, Custom installers & Updates. Traditionally a source of headaches for developers and IT managers.

Modern Application: Trusted Distribution & Signed Packages. Distribution is performed from a trusted source and never from the web.
Desktop Application: Web, SCCM & Custom distribution. No control over what is installed, affects the whole machine.

Modern Application: Modern UI. Different input mechanisms, ink, touch, gamepad, keyboard, mouse, etc.
Desktop Application: Windows Forms, WPF, MFC. Designed for the mouse and keyboard for a dense UI and to get the most productivity from the desktop.

Modern Application: Cloud First Data with Insights. Source of truth in the cloud. Insights to know what happens with your app and how it’s performing.
Desktop Application: Local Data. Traditional desktop applications usually need some local data.

Modern Application: Designed for reuse. Reuse in mind between different platforms, front end, and back end, running assets in many places as possible.
